item.title: ‘Leanne’ Review: Leanne Morgan’s Chuck Lorre-Produced Netflix Comedy Is a Reliably Nice Time
item.description: The standup comedian stars as a 50something woman who’s just been dumped by her husband of three decades, alongside an ensemble cast including Kristen Johnson, Ryan Stiles and Celia Weston.

item.title: Netflix’s ‘Leanne’ Is a Heaping Plate of Southern Charm With a Side of Mid-life Reinvention: TV Review
item.description: When the comedian Leanne Morgan reached her mid-50s, her life drastically changed. The same is true of the namesake character she plays on the Netflix sitcom “Leanne,” albeit in a less interesting way
